commonRoomDescription: This is a grand and opulent common room, likely within a historic, possibly magical, castle. The room boasts towering stone walls adorned with elaborate tapestries depicting lush foliage and rich, patterned wallpaper in hues of red and orange. Numerous framed paintings, some quite large and gilded, decorate the upper wall spaces. High arched windows, some featuring stained glass, allow strong shafts of natural light to illuminate different sections of the room. The floor is covered with large, intricately patterned rugs, predominantly in deep reds, blues, and gold, over what appears to be a stone floor. The space is furnished with a variety of antique-style furniture, including plush armchairs, cushioned sofas, and various wooden tables, suggesting a comfortable lounge area. Several large, ornate globes on stands, lamps, and display cabinets filled with interesting artifacts add to the scholarly and arcane atmosphere. Banners bearing crests, one with a prominent 'H' and another with a lion/griffin motif, hang from the high walls, hinting at a specific institution or house. Several individuals (students or residents) are scattered throughout the room, engaging in quiet activities like reading or conversing.

frames.description: The initial view of the common room from a slightly elevated position behind a character in a dark red robe. The left side is dominated by a tall, ornate wooden display cabinet and a large stained-glass window. A prominent globe lamp stands to the immediate right of the character.
frames.pov: The camera is positioned directly behind and slightly above the main character, looking straight into the expansive room. The left half of the common room, including a grand display cabinet and a tall window, is prominent, while the right side with more distant activity is less defined.

frames.description: A very subtle shift from the first frame. The character and the immediate surroundings remain largely the same, with only minute changes in the perspective of the distant background elements.
frames.pov: A slight lateral shift to the right compared to Frame 1. The left edge of the tall display cabinet is marginally less visible, and a sliver more of the patterned rug on the right foreground comes into view.

frames.description: The camera has moved further to the right and slightly forward. The central seating area with various people is becoming clearer. The archway in the far right background is slightly more centered in the frame.
frames.pov: The camera has continued to pan gently to the right and moved a short distance forward. The globe lamp is now more distinctly to the left of the character, and the perspective of the distant archway on the right has opened up slightly.

frames.description: The view progresses further right, revealing more of the activity in the central and right sections of the common room. A large wooden table laden with a bowl of fruit and surrounded by chairs is now more clearly visible on the right.
frames.pov: The camera has taken a more noticeable step to the right and slightly forward. The prominent globe lamp is now further to the left of the character, and the right side of the room, including a significant dining-style table, is gaining prominence.

frames.description: The common room unfolds further to the right. The large display cabinet on the far left is now less central. The arched doorway in the mid-ground on the right becomes a more significant feature, leading deeper into the castle.
frames.pov: A continued and more pronounced movement to the right. The elements on the far left of the room are receding from view, while the central archway and the right side of the room are becoming more central, expanding the visible space.

frames.description: The camera's pan to the right is evident, making the left side of the frame less cluttered and bringing more of the right-side architecture into view. The grand fireplace on the far right begins to emerge.
frames.pov: The camera continues its rightward and slightly forward trajectory. The globe lamp is now almost entirely to the character's left, and the fireplace structure on the far right is starting to become a significant visual element, revealing more of the room's depth.

frames.description: The common room is now largely viewed from a new angle, emphasizing the right side. The grand, ornate stone fireplace with a glowing fire is clearly visible on the far right, adding warmth to the scene.
frames.pov: A substantial rightward shift has occurred. The character is still centered, but the room has pivoted around them. The left-most features are almost entirely out of frame, while the grand fireplace and an adjacent archway on the right are now prominent features.

frames.description: The fireplace on the right is now a major focal point, with its intricate stone carvings and the details of the burning fire clearly visible. The overall depth of the room towards distant archways is more apparent.
frames.pov: The camera has moved further to the right. The character is now positioned more to the left of the frame. The fireplace on the right is increasingly centralized, showcasing its full detail and size.

frames.description: This frame provides a comprehensive view of the right side of the common room. The grand fireplace occupies a significant portion of the right, and the multiple archways leading to other areas are well-defined in the background.
frames.pov: Continuing the steady rightward pan and slight forward movement. The fireplace is now a dominant feature on the right side, capturing its full impressive scale. The distant archways appear more 'straight on' from this new perspective.

frames.description: The final frame in the sequence fully captures the expansive nature of the common room from this new perspective. The fireplace is robustly present on the right, balanced by the depth of the room through the central archways and further beyond.
frames.pov: The camera has reached its rightmost and furthest forward position in this sequence. The character is now noticeably off-center to the left, and the fireplace on the right is fully framed. The overall breadth and depth of the common room are well-represented.
